subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Eastern Conference finals were within the Rangers’ grasp Wednesday night, but they fell behind 1 minute 28 seconds into the game on a power-play goal from Alex Ovechkin and went on to lose.
snippet: The Eastern Conference finals were within the Rangers’ grasp Wednesday night, but they fell behind 1 minute 28 seconds into the game on a power-play goal from Alex Ovechkin and went on to lose.
